Events that occurred on 30 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes the poem KÃ´r.
1941 - Voice actor Sean Arnold is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 64.
1952 - Brazilian translator Ronald Kyrmse is born.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Stanley Unwin.
1954 - Programmer Don Woods is born.
1995 - Voice actor Michael Graham Cox dies.
2003 - J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography by Leslie Ellen Jones is published.
2004 - Tolkien Studies: Volume 1 is published.
2005 - The Forsaken Realm of Tolkien is published.
2005 - Interrupted Music: The Making of Tolkien's Mythology is published.
2007 - Roots and Branches is published.
2011 - Tolkien and Wales: Language, Literature and Identity by Carl Phelpstead was published.
2018 - Poetry and Song in the works of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
2020 - The deluxe edition of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight: with Pearl and Sir Orfeo is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
